content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I understand you might need HVAC assistance. May I have your name to get started?
Hi there, my name is Susan.
Thanks, Susan. Could you please provide your address so I can check our service availability?
Thank you. I'm verifying that we can service that area now.
Great news, Susan! We do service your area. When would be an ideal time for our technician to visit you?
I need someone next week, preferably in the late afternoon around 5 pm or later.
Let me check our schedule for late afternoon slots next week for you.
Unfortunately, our available appointments next week are only between 9 am and 3 pm. Do you have any flexibility with your timing?
No, I really only can do late afternoon. That won't work for me.
I understand, Susan. If late afternoon next week is not possible with us, would you like me to see if there are any slots available the following week or would you prefer to explore other options?
I think I'll have to look elsewhere. Thanks for trying, though.
reason: Customer declined due to unsuitable available times
